channel.title: [PI]Npc not showing a yellow dop on map
channel.description:
Hello,
I wanna know how I make npc's a yellow dot in map. Current some npc's in my game don't got them. So that's kind of annoying. Not sure if it's client/server sided.
The npc that has this is the 'rat' and some more. Not sure if it supposed to be like this but I really want to it have to a yellow dot I know where the npc's are. (also the little ones)
